item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Lewis), post:22, topic:323519”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=419924.msg3086890#msg3086890 date=1262562975]
THis is what I don’t get. People always spend all this time and effort, adding shit to their server, from 200 revisions ahead of their current revision. WHY THE HELL DON’T YOU JUST MAKE A 525 INSTEAD OF ADDING EVERY PIECE OF A 525 SERVER TO YOUR 317?
[/quote]

508+ suck dick, the worst servers are 500+, people who make the RuneScape 2 servers aim for perfection yet if they wanted a perfect rs p server there already is one, it’s called RuneScape, just go to the runescape site and click play but the people who make 317-474 actually try to do something different, add some magic to servers make them unique and have something interesting to them.[/quote]

I know, I despise anything other than 317/377. I’m just saying that why would you spend all that time and effort to make your server a faux 525, instead of just miking it an actual 525?
